title: Minimal Portfolio Website
description: Minimalist responsive site made using only HTML & CSS. Hosted via GitHub Pages.

title: Note Manager Micro SaaS
description: Note categorizer and markdown-supported web app. Built with Firebase backend and custom UI logic.

title: YouLearn - Curated Learning Platform
description: YouLearn is a YouTube-powered education-only video platform designed to recommend only curated content for learners. Built using YouTube Data API and basic ML filtering.
